GPUDeviceLostInfo.summary: The GPUDeviceLostInfo interface of the {{domxref("WebGPU API", "WebGPU API", "", "nocode")}} represents the object returned when the {{jsxref("Promise")}} resolves. This provides information as to why a device has been lost.

remarks.para: See the page for more information about "lost" state.

GPUDeviceLostInfoMessage.summary:
The message read-only property of the
interface provides a human-readable message that explains why the device was lost.

GPUDeviceLostInfoReason.summary:
The reason read-only property of the
interface defines the reason the device was lost in a machine-readable way.
GPUDeviceLostInfoReason.value: An enumerated value. At the moment the only value defined in the spec is "destroyed", which indicates that the device was destroyed by a call to .If the device was lost because of an unknown reason not covered in the available enumerated values, reason returns undefined.
